static void Err::check ( bool  passed,
const char *  msg 
) [inline, static]

errAbort based version of assert with an error message. Try to use this method in conjunction with a const char * message (rather than constructing a string every time) when writing a check that will be called lots of times.

Parameters:
passed - Condition to be checked.
msg - Error message if failed.
